titles.title: Freedom of the Press Reinforcement Act
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit representatives of the foreign press to enter the United States under the visa waiver program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 7/14/2004--Introduced. Freedom of the Press Reinforcement Act - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to allow aliens who are representatives of foreign press, radio, film, or other foreign information media to enter the United States as B (temporary visitors for business) nonimmigrants under the visa waiver program.
